title: ArchitecturalContract
description: AC sealed artifact schema — PRODUCTION_SPEC_V2.1 G0/G6 gate. Every field is required; missing fields → FAIL_CLOSED.

ac_id.description: Globally unique AC identifier. Pattern: AC-<UPPERCASE_ALPHANUM_8+>

ac_version.description: Semantic version of this AC document

issuer.description: DID or stable identity of the issuing authority

ac_version_sha256.description: SHA-256 hex of canonical AC.package serialization (G0-BASELINE_SEAL)

env_class.description: Allowed environment classes. NO_TEE is forbidden for PROD_SPEC.

min_replay_n.description: Minimum replay count required for G4-RUNTIME gate (PROD default: 500)

critical_controls.description: SSDF control IDs that must have 100% coverage. All must appear in ssdf_map.

invariants.description: System invariants that G7-FORMAL must prove via Z3/TLA+

ssdf_coverage_threshold.description: Minimum SSDF coverage fraction required for G3 gate (PROD_SPEC: ≥0.80)

kid.description: Key ID referencing AC_ROOT_CERT registry entry

signature.description: G6-AUTH: JWS signature — must verify against AC_ROOT_KEY trust chain
